page.title: 08My house in Fletchertown.
page.content: I live at 9 Front Street,Fletchertown. The house was built for a miner and his family.My grandfather used to be a coal miner. In my house we have got two bedrooms and one attic room,which we sometimes use as a bedroom.The bathroom is downstairs and the kitchen is next to the bathroom. When the house was built there was no bathroom. The living room is at the back of the house and there is a pantry next to it We have a parlour at the front of the house.We have a coloured television,a portable television and a pool table in the attic.We have two coal fires in the house and a gas fire.We have a shower in the bathroom.At the back of the house there is a yard where we keep our bikes and the coal bunkers. There is also a washing line and a back gate,which leads out into a narrow street between the houses.
